solution_line_template: This month, Christine earned a commission of {commission_rate} x ${total_sales} = ${<{commission_rate}*{total_sales}={commission_earned}>>{commission_earned}.

She allocated {personal_needs_percentage} x ${commission_earned} = ${<{personal_needs_percentage}*{commission_earned}={allocated_for_personal_needs}>>{allocated_for_personal_needs} on her personal needs.
